what is the introduction of COMP9311?
Database Systems: A first course on database management systems. Data modelling; principles of database design; data manipulation languages; database application techniques; introduction to DBMS internals; introduction to advanced databases. Lab: design and implementation of a database application using SQL and stored procedures.
